bibl.title: The Names Flavius and Aurelius as Status Designations in Later Roman Egypt. (Suite.)
bibl.note: Suite de: ZPE 11 (1973) pp. 33-63. - IV. Selected Topics. - V. Summary of Conclusions Regarding the Names Flavius in Later Roman Egypt. - VI. Epilogue.
Keenan James G., The Names Flavius and Aurelius as Status Designations in Later Roman Egypt. (Suite.)
